mapper.select: SELECT id , version , create_time , description FROM strategy_deploy WHERE id = ${id} AND is_trash = false ORDER BY version DESC
SELECT a.id , a.name , a.user_id , b.version , b.create_time , b.description , b.code FROM strategy a JOIN strategy_deploy b on a.id = b.id WHERE b.version = ${version} AND a.id = ${id}
